mapper.delete: DELETE FROM friend WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND follower_id = #{followerId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as id, u.nickname as nickname, u.user_level as user_level, u.user_exp as user_exp, u.height as height, u.weight as weight, u.info_disclose as info_disclose FROM friend f INNER JOIN user u WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY `follow_index` ASC
